organization.name: ʻĀina Haina Parent-Teacher Association
organization.mission: Dedicated to enhancing the educational experience for students through parent involvement, community building, and support for school programs.
organization.meetingDay: Monthly meetings (see schedule for specific dates)

contact.address: ʻĀina Haina Elementary School, 801 W Hind Iuka Dr, Honolulu, HI 96821

hero.title: Supporting Our Students
hero.subtitle: The ʻĀina Haina Parent-Teacher Association (PTA) is dedicated to enhancing the educational experience for every student. Your involvement and contributions make a significant difference.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Our PTA is dedicated to supporting our school community through various programs and initiatives that enhance our children's educational journey.

cards.title: Educational Programs
cards.description: We support enrichment programs, field trips, and educational resources that enhance classroom learning and provide new opportunities for growth.

cards.title: Community Building
cards.description: Through events, fundraisers, and volunteer opportunities, we strengthen bonds between families, teachers, and students in our ʻohana.

cards.title: Student Support
cards.description: We provide funding for technology, library resources, playground equipment, and other essentials that directly benefit our students' daily experience.

meetingsSection.nextMeetingDescription: Discuss upcoming events and initiatives with us. All parents are welcome!
meetingsSection.noUpcomingTitle: Stay tuned for our next meeting
meetingsSection.noUpcomingDescription: We'll announce our next meeting date soon. Check back for updates!

joinPta.title: Become a Member
joinPta.description: Ready to make a difference in your children's education? By becoming a PTA member, you're supporting our school, a PTA network.

events.title: Family Fun Night
events.description: Bring your family, make new friends, and be part of the fun; join the PTA at Family Fun Night!

events.title: CPK Night
events.description: Dine in or take out at California Pizza Kitchen Kahala and support our school!  A portion of the proceeds will go to the PTA.

events.title: Fall Movie Night
events.description: Join us for a fun family movie night! Bring blankets and enjoy a great film together.

events.title: Jaguar Jog 2026
events.description: Help support out annual Jaguar Jog to raise money for the school.

events.title: Panda Express Night
events.description: Dine in or take out at Panda Express and support our school!  A portion of the proceeds will go to the PTA.  Must order through the app

events.title: Trunk or Treat
events.description: Halloween fun for the whole family! Decorate your car trunk and join us for trick-or-treating.

events.title: Keiki Swap/Craft Fair and Holiday Movie Night
events.description: Craft Fair from 3:30-5:30 PM, then Holiday Movie Night starting at 6:15 PM. Join us for crafts, swapping, and festive fun!

events.title: Spring Movie Night
events.description: Another fantastic family movie night to enjoy together!

events.title: Kanikapila Festival
events.description: Celebrate with music, food, and community at our annual Kanikapila Festival!
